author: A_Brickset_user
title: Good Castle value pack
review: If you get a chance to pick one of these up go for it because the value pack is a good addition to your castle collection.  It includes four figures and a ghost, so that helps build your army if you want to create one.  The Wolfpack set is a nice idea because there are only two other Wolfpack sets.  The boat is nothing special really but the archer's round target is a pretty nifty piece that has come in handy for some Castle displays I've built.  Recommended.

author: hustla187
title: Dragons vs. Wolves
review: If you are a huge 90's castle fan, you should have this by now. You get a ghost, one Wolfpack minifig, 2 Dragon Knights, and an archer with a target. If you have Wolfpack or Dragon Knights sets, this will fit perfectly.
